alert.note: Alert for Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 8:14PM CDT until September 16 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Southeastern Brown County in north central Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles northeast of Elsmere, or 18 miles south of Ainsworth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rose, Hofeld Lake, Raven, Duff, Sybrant, Jones Lake, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area, Johnsons Corner and Pony Lake. This includes Highway 183 between mile markers 153 and 171. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
